SELECT T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , T1.CNTR_NO || '_' || T1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_NO_SN , T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO , T4.RCGVP_KNM AS CST_KNM , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'PD_GRP_CD', T7.PD_PRP_VAL20) AS PD_GRP_NM , T6.PD_NM , T4.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO , T4.MEXNO_ENCR , T4.CRAL_IDV_TNO , T5.NEW_ADR_ZIP , T5.RNADR||' '||T5.RDADR AS RADR , (SELECT S1.DGR1_LEVL_OG_NM FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ S1 WHERE S1.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(DECODE(T1.WK_EXCN_DT,'',TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM'),T1.WK_EXCN_DT),1,6) AND S1.OG_ID = NVL(T9.OG_ID, T10.OG_ID)) AS GNRDV , (SELECT S1.DGR2_LEVL_OG_NM FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ S1 WHERE S1.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(DECODE(T1.WK_EXCN_DT,'',TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM'),T1.WK_EXCN_DT),1,6) AND S1.OG_ID = NVL(T9.OG_ID, T10.OG_ID)) AS RGRP , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD', T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD) AS ALNC_BZS_CD , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD', T1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD) AS SV_BIZ_DCLSF_NM , T2.CNSL_MO_CN , T11.OG_NM AS SV_CNR_OG_ID , T1.RPB_LOCARA_CD , T11.PRTNR_KNM||'('||T1.ICHR_PRTNR_NO||')' AS PRTNR , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T1.ARV_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' ' || TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T1.ARV_HH,'HH24MISS'),'HH24:MI:SS') AS ARV_DTM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T1.WK_EXCN_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' ' || TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(T1.WK_EXCN_HH,'HH24MISS'),'HH24:MI:SS') AS VST_FSH_DTM , CASE WHEN (T1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD = '20') THEN 'AD' ELSE 'AY' END WK_PRGS_STAT_CD_GUBUN , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'WK_PRGS_STAT_CD', T1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD) AS WK_PRGS_STAT_NM , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'WK_CAN_CAUS_CD', SUBSTR(T1.WK_CAN_RSON_CD, 1, 2)) AS WK_CAN_CAUS , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'RCP_CAN_RSON_CD', T1.WK_CAN_RSON_CD) AS RCP_CAN_RSON , T1.WK_CAN_MO_CN , CASE WHEN (T1.IST_IMP_PHO_APN_YN1 = 'Y' OR T1.IST_IMP_PHO_APN_YN2 = 'Y' OR T1.IST_IMP_PHO_APN_YN3 = 'Y') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CANC_IMG_YN , T1.WK_CAN_UNUITM_CN AS UNUITM /* 이미지파일 UID */ , (SELECT FILE_UID FROM T_CMD_ATTH_FILE_D WHERE TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND ATTH_DOC_ID = T1.IST_IMP_PHO_APN_DOC_ID1 AND DEL_YN = 'N') AS IST_IMP_PHO_APN_FILE_UID1 , (SELECT FILE_UID FROM T_CMD_ATTH_FILE_D WHERE TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND ATTH_DOC_ID = T1.IST_IMP_PHO_APN_DOC_ID2 AND DEL_YN = 'N') AS IST_IMP_PHO_APN_FILE_UID2 , (SELECT FILE_UID FROM T_CMD_ATTH_FILE_D WHERE TENANT_ID = 'TNT_WELLS' AND ATTH_DOC_ID = T1.IST_IMP_PHO_APN_DOC_ID3 AND DEL_YN = 'N') AS IST_IMP_PHO_APN_FILE_UID3 FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ T1 /*고객서비스AS설치배정내역*/ INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ T2 /*고객서비스AS설치대상내역*/ ON T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = T2.CST_SV_ASN_NO AND T2.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL T3 /*계약주소관계*/ ON T1.CNTR_NO = T3.DTL_CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T3.DTL_CNTR_SN AND T3.ADRPC_TP_CD IN ('2','3') AND T3.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS T4 /*계약주소지기본*/ ON T3.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = T4.CNTR_ADRPC_ID AND T4.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS T5 ON T4.ADR_ID = T5.ADR_ID AND T5.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T6 ON T2.PD_CD = T6.PD_CD AND T6.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T7 ON T6.PD_CD = T7.PD_CD AND T7.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD = 'PART' AND T7.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ T8 ON T1.CNTR_NO = T8.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T8.CNTR_SN AND T8.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T9 ON T9.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(DECODE(T1.WK_EXCN_DT,'',TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM'),T1.WK_EXCN_DT),1,6) AND T2.RCP_ICHR_PRTNR_NO = T9.PRTNR_NO AND T9.OG_TP_CD = 'W02' AND T9.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T10 ON T10.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(DECODE(T1.WK_EXCN_DT,'',TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM'),T1.WK_EXCN_DT),1,6) AND T8.MNGT_PRTNR_NO = T10.PRTNR_NO AND T10.OG_TP_CD = 'W02' AND T10.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ T11 ON T11.BASE_YM = SUBSTR(DECODE(T1.WK_EXCN_DT,'',TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM'),T1.WK_EXCN_DT),1,6) AND T1.ICHR_PRTNR_NO = T11.PRTNR_NO AND T11.OG_TP_CD IN ('W03', 'W06') AND T11.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE 1=1
AND T2.FNL_RCPDT BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate} /* 조회기준 : 접수일자 */
AND T1.WK_EXCN_DT BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate} /* 조회기준 : 처리일자 */
AND T1.VST_CNFMDT BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate} /* 조회기준 : 방문확정일 */
AND T1.VST_DUEDT BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate} /* 조회기준 : 예정일자 */
AND T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = '1' AND T8.ALNC_BZS_CD = '03' /* 서비스유형 : 홈쇼핑만 */
AND T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = '3' /* 서비스유형 : 리콜 */ AND ((T2.CNSL_TP_HCLSF_CD = 'L001' AND T2.CNSL_TP_MCLSF_CD = 'N005' AND T2.CNSL_TP_LCLSF_CD = 'C015') OR (T2.CNSL_TP_HCLSF_CD = 'L001' AND T2.CNSL_TP_MCLSF_CD = 'N003' AND T2.CNSL_TP_LCLSF_CD = 'C008'))
AND T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = #{serviceType} /* 서비스유형 */
AND T1.SV_CNR_OG_ID = #{serviceCenter} /* 서비스센터 */
AND T1.ICHR_PRTNR_NO = #{engineer} /* 엔지니어 */
AND T1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD = #{wkPrgsStatCd} /* 작업상태 */
AND T7.PD_PRP_VAL20 = #{pdGrpCd} /* 상품그룹 */
AND T6.PD_CD = #{pdCd} /* 상품코드 */
AND SUBSTR(T1.WK_CAN_RSON_CD, 1, 2) = #{canCaus} /* 취소원인 */
AND T1.WK_CAN_RSON_CD = #{canRson} /* 취소사유 */
AND T1.WK_CAN_RSON_CD IS NOT NULL
AND T1.ICHR_PRTNR_NO != '372' /* 물류처리건제외 */
AND T1.ICHR_PRTNR_NO != '99992' /* 택배발송 제외 */
